patterns.description: Detects 'omg!' to trigger the mistake-learning workflow
patterns.message:
ðŸ¤¦ User caught a mistake! Follow the omg-learn workflow:
1. Acknowledge the mistake
2. Ask: What tool did I misuse? (Bash/Write/Edit/Prompt)
3. Ask: What was the problematic input/behavior?
4. Design pattern: hook, matcher, regex, action, message
5. Test with omg-learn test
6. Save the pattern
patterns.note: Triggers the learning workflow when user says 'omg!' to catch mistakes

patterns.description: Prevent piping command output to head (loses critical end output)
patterns.message: ERROR: Using head with command output loses critical success/failure info at the end. Use full output or tail instead.
